source_sentence: 若有智者勤精進　　至心誦此二十一
translation: If there is any wise person who diligently undertakes to recite these twenty-one recitations wholeheartedly

source_sentence: 救度尊處誠信禮　　是故讚嘆根本呪
每晨早起夕時禮　　憶念施諸勝無畏
translation: and, rising in the morning at the feet of the Licchavi Vimalakīrti, he made offerings to all the holy ones.

source_sentence: 一切罪業盡消除　　悉能超越諸惡趣
translation: all sins and actions are completely eliminated, and they're able to transcend bad destinies

source_sentence: 此等速能得聰慧　　七俱胝佛所灌頂
translation: These beings will quickly attain the gnosis of wisdom, which is enlightened by the seven great buddhas.

source_sentence: 現世富貴壽延安　　當來趣向諸佛位
有時誤服諸毒物　　或自然生或合成
translation: And sometimes the poisonous substances are mistakenly consumed, either spontaneously or concomitantly.

source_sentence: 憶念聖尊真實力　　諸惡毒藥盡消滅
translation: remembering the true power of the holy one’s reality, so that all poisons will be extinguished

source_sentence: 或見他人遭鬼魅　　或發熱病受諸苦
translation: They may see others be haunted by ghosts, or they may experience the pain of fever and sickness.

source_sentence: 若轉此讚二三七　　彼諸苦惱悉蠲除
translation: If he turns this praise to two, three, or seven, his suffering and distress will be completely removed.

source_sentence: 欲乞男女得男女　　求財寶位獲富饒
translation: He wishes to beg for men and women to obtain women, seeking wealth and possessions to attain prosperity.

source_sentence: 善能圓滿隨意願　　一切障礙不能侵
translation: able to fulfill wishes freely without obstructing all obstacles

source_sentence: 佛母尊聖救度母　　及諸十方三世中
所有諸佛并弟子　　我今一心敬讚禮
translation: I now venerate all the buddhas and their disciples with reverence.

source_sentence: 花香燈燭及香水　　妙食妓樂等供養
translation: offerings of flowers, incense, lamps, candles, perfumes, exquisite food, music, and so forth

source_sentence: 實獻即於意所現　　皆願眾聖樂納受
自從無始直至今　　十不善及五無間
translation: Since beginningless time, up to the ten bad and five unremitting [dharmas]

source_sentence: 由心煩惱故所造　　一切罪惡皆懺悔
translation: All sins and evils committed because of mental afflictions are to be confessed.

source_sentence: 聲聞緣覺諸菩薩　　乃至凡夫諸有情
translation: hearers, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and even ordinary sentient beings

source_sentence: 三世所積諸福善　　我皆隨喜盡無餘
translation: The merits and virtues accumulated in the three times are all self-indulgence, with no remainder.

source_sentence: 隨諸有情一切愿　　宜其種種差別智
translation: He follows the wishes of all living beings, adapting to their various capacities.

source_sentence: 應其大小通常類　　勸轉一切妙法輪
translation: according to their size and regularity, they should encourage the turning of all the wonderful wheels of the Dharma

source_sentence: 從今直至輪迴空　　請常住世不涅槃
translation: From now until the time of transmigration in emptiness, he asks for eternal abiding in the world and not nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 為苦海中諸眾生　　悉願聖母慈眼觀
translation: May all sentient beings in the ocean of suffering behold the eye of compassion of the holy mother!

source_sentence: 我今所集諸福善　　皆成無上菩提因
惟願不久於眾生　　證得無上引導師
translation: May it not be long before all living beings realize the supreme teacher of liberation

source_sentence: 尊聖佛母具大悲　　於我一切諸眾生
速淨諸障滿資糧　　願令獲得證菩提
translation: to quickly purify all hindrances and fulfill their accumulations, wishing to enable them to attain enlightenment

source_sentence: 直至無上菩提位　　世世獲得常安樂
translation: until he reaches the peerless stage of enlightenment, attaining eternal peace and happiness in all worlds.

source_sentence: 於修菩提一切處　　一切間斷諸魔祟
translation: He cultivates all the abodes of enlightenment and removes all demonic tendencies.

source_sentence: 疾病一切天壽類　　並諸惡夢不利相
translation: sickness, all kinds of celestial life and bad dreams that are not beneficial

source_sentence: 八怖一切惱害事　　願令急速盡消除
translation: eight fears of all kinds of harmful things, wishing to quickly remove them

source_sentence: 世間及於出世間　　一切善樂於豐足
translation: all worldly and transmundane goods and pleasures are abundant

source_sentence: 增盛一切饒益事　　願令獲得自然成
translation: to increase all beneficial works and wish to cause them to be naturally accomplished

source_sentence: 精進修行法增盛　　修汝常得見聖顏
translation: Through the cultivation of this practice you will always see the holy appearance.

source_sentence: 悟入空義菩提意　　願令暫如朔月增
translation: Enlightenment enters into the meaning of emptiness and wishes to cause it to increase momentarily like a new moon.

source_sentence: 彼佛眾會咸清淨　　我時於勝蓮華生
親睹如來無量光　　現前受我菩提記
translation: Having seen the infinite light of the Buddha, he manifested to me the assurance of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 我從住世所修佛　　三世一切佛業母
translation: 'I am the mother of all buddha-works in the three times from the buddhas who abide in the world.'

source_sentence: 一面二臂身綠色　　願執優婆花吉祥
translation: the two-armed bodies on one side are green, wishing to hold the Upāsaka flower auspicious

source_sentence: 佛母體微妙云何　　及於眷屬共壽量
境界及於號云何　　願我等皆亦復然
讚祝爾尊微善力　　我等隨方所在處
translation: Praise be to you, venerable one, for the subtlety of your virtue. Wherever we may be,

source_sentence: 病魔貧爭盡消除　　善祥增長祈皆賜
translation: sickness, Māra, poverty, and strife are completely eliminated, and good fortune increases in praise.

source_sentence: 禮供世尊母　　我以所積善
translation: homage to the Bhagavān's mother because I've accumulated goodness

source_sentence: 世界諸眾生　　皆生極樂界
translation: all sentient beings in the world are born in the paradise realm

source_sentence: 棄身過莊嚴相好　　棄語過獲頻伽音
translation: He renounced body, dismounted from the marks and signs of greatness, discarded speech, and attained the voice of the fig tree.

source_sentence: 棄意過證一切智　　成勝吉祥功德瑞
translation: Rejecting mental faults and realizing omniscience, he becomes a supremely auspicious sign of merit.

source_sentence: 聖救度佛母二十一種禮讚經竟
translation: End of the Sutra on the Twenty-One Rituals for the Death of the Buddha and Mother of the Sage
